texts: Our team has developed a unique algorithm for analyzing journal entries, which greatly helps users in examining their thoughts. Our model has been trained using open data and educational materials on cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT).
Here are some recommendations to improve the quality of your entry analysis:
Describe not only events but also delve into your emotions and thoughts in detail. Remember that the quality of the analysis directly depends on the quality of your entry.
Try to describe one specific situation or thought. If multiple events occurred during the day, it's better to create a second entry and analyze it separately.
While the algorithm is designed to identify irrational and destructive beliefs in your entries, you can also mention positive moments.

Our team has developed a unique algorithm for analyzing diary entries that significantly helps users in analyzing their thoughts. Our model is trained on open data and training materials on cognitive behavioral therapy.

You can describe a situation that worries you or share your feelings in a free form. Our algorithm will analyze your text and give you results that will help you better understand yourself and your thoughts.
Check out a demo of the analysis by clicking the button below.

I feel like people around me see me as a failure. For example, today at work there was a mistake on my part. My supervisor asked me to correct it. However, his tone was such that I couldn't help but feel that he really thinks I am a failure.

Our team has developed a unique algorithm for analyzing records. AI will study your situation, help you look at it from a different perspective, and provide useful recommendations within the framework of CBT.
Describe not only the events but also elaborate on your emotions and thoughts. Remember that the quality of the analysis directly depends on the quality of your record.
Try to describe one specific situation or thought. If several events occurred in a day, it is better to create a second record and analyze it separately.
Sometimes classical CBT tools may not be enough; in these moments, it is helpful to turn to best practices from other approaches.
Deep dream psychoanalysis will allow you to uncover intermediate and deep beliefs that are hard to access consciously.

Our AI model will perform a classical psychoanalysis of your dream, giving you the opportunity to better understand your subconscious, which will facilitate working with cognitive psychology techniques.

mockGpt.consolation: Sometimes we tend to give more meaning to other people's words and actions than they actually have. Mistakes at work are common and they don't define your value as a professional or a person. Remember your achievements and strengths that make you unique.
solutions: Try to separate constructive criticism from personal evaluations. Your boss may have simply pointed out a mistake, which is a normal part of the work process.
Think about past successes and achievements at work. This will help you see that one mistake doesn't make you a failure.
Work on strengthening your self-esteem. The higher your self-esteem, the less likely you are to perceive others' words as criticism of your personality.
mockGpt.distortion: Chosen due to generalizing one incident (mistake at work) to an overall personality assessment ("everyone thinks I'm a failure")
mockGpt.negativeThought: I feel that everyone around me thinks I'm a failure
mockGpt.adaptiveResponse: One mistake at work doesn't define me as a professional or a person. It's important to learn from mistakes and remember your successes and qualities.

mockGptDream.common: The dream symbolizes an inner journey through fears and hidden desires. The atmosphere of the castle, the stormy sea, and the destruction may reflect a sense of instability and deep emotional experiences. Psychoanalysis interprets such dreams as an expression of inner conflicts and the pursuit of self-knowledge.
symbols: üè∞ Castle: Symbol of security, power, and isolation. May indicate your inner state and boundaries.
üåä Stormy sea: Symbol of strong emotions, subconscious fears, and changes.
üîÆ Massive mirror: Symbol of self-knowledge, reflection of the inner ¬´self¬ª and its perception.
transfer: üßë‚Äçüíº Your altered reflection in the mirror may reflect your desire to understand and accept your true essence.
üè∞ The castle may represent your protection and isolation from the outside world, and its destruction ‚Äì the fear of losing this protection.
üåä The sea becoming stormier may symbolize your growing emotional experiences and fear of uncontrollable forces.
mockGptDream.desires: The hidden desire to gain understanding and control over your deep emotions and fears, the aspiration for inner enlightenment and self-knowledge.
mockGptDream.fears: Fear of changes and instability, of losing control and the destruction of the familiar world.
mockGptDream.middle: I strive for stability and security in my life.
mockGptDream.deep: I believe that inner forces and emotions can be destructive, and I need to be ready for any changes and challenges.
mockGptDream.conclusion: The dream reflects inner conflicts and fears associated with changes and self-knowledge. Your psyche is trying to integrate new realizations and cope with deep emotional experiences.

texts: Share your ideas and get feedback from other users!
Inspire others with your story, suggest an interesting topic to ponder, or share what's troubling you. Your idea might support someone in a tough time or simply lift someone's spirits.
It's all completely anonymous, and you can hide your posts anytime you want.
